trigger_event: On every `git push` to a feature branch.
success_criteria: Linting passes; Unit test coverage > 85%; SAST scan finds no new critical/high vulnerabilities.
failure_action: Block pull request merge; Post failure report to PR.
escalation_procedure: PR author is responsible for fixing the build.
business_impact: Prevents basic errors and security flaws from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: All API integration tests pass; All contract tests (Pact) pass; E2E smoke test suite for critical paths (Login, Place Order) passes.
failure_action: Automatically roll back the deployment; Create P1 incident and alert on-call developer.
escalation_procedure: On-call dev investigates; Incident report required for rollback.
business_impact: Ensures the staging environment remains stable for manual QA and UAT.

trigger_event: Manual trigger for release from `main` branch.
success_criteria: Full regression suite (E2E) passes on Staging; All performance benchmarks met in performance environment; No outstanding P0/P1 bugs; Manual QA sign-off.
failure_action: Block production deployment; Release manager convenes a go/no-go meeting.
responsible_team: Release Manager, QA Lead, Tech Lead
business_impact: Final quality check to prevent production incidents and ensure release readiness.
